Package com.teksystems.salestaxexercise

Interface TaxableBasket

All Superinterfaces:
Basket, Sellable, Taxable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TaxableBasketImpl
public interface TaxableBasket
extends Taxable, Basket
Interface for a taxable collection of sellable items.
Author:
Andrew

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.joda.money.CurrencyUnit getCurrencyUnit()
    Get the currency associated with this basket.
    java.util.LinkedHashSet<TaxJurisdiction> getTaxJurisdictions()
    Get the tax jurisdiction associated with this basket.

    Methods inherited from interface com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.Basket

    add, addAll, clear, getAllItemsWithCount, remove, removeAll

    Methods inherited from interface com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.Sellable

    getPrice, getRegionOfSale

    Methods inherited from interface com.teksystems.salestaxexercise.Taxable

  • Method Details

    • getCurrencyUnit

      org.joda.money.CurrencyUnit getCurrencyUnit()
      Get the currency associated with this basket. TODO: not sure this getter should be here, as currency is not really tax-specific. It should really apply to any sellable basket, regardless of taxes. Maybe this should be moved to the Basket interface instead?
      Returns:
      The currency for this basket.

    • getTaxJurisdictions

      java.util.LinkedHashSet<TaxJurisdiction> getTaxJurisdictions()
      Get the tax jurisdiction associated with this basket.
      Returns:
      The tax jurisdiction for this basket.
